Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I'm getting this weird issue when I have SAS turned on; I can't turn the ship at all, I know the whole point of it is to keep the ship in one direction but normally I can still turn the ship just fine, having SAS on just helps to keep it stable but now all of a sudden I can't move at all with it on, I have to turn it off to move even just a tiny bit.

I do notice the ship wobble a tiny bit when using wasd controls like it's trying but seems completely locked in position until I turn SAS off.

I've tried other ships and reloading and stuff, still have this issue though.
I've never seen this, and I have heavily modded my install. What mods do you use?

hmm lets see..

KOSMOS SSPP

Docking Port Alignment Indicator

Community Tech Tree

OPT Space Plane Parts

RLA Stockalike

Better Buoyancy

StageRecovery

Distant Object Enhancement

Universal Storage

DMagic Orbital Science

B9 Aerospace Pack

KW Rocketry

NovaPunch

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement

Ferram Aerospace Research

RemoteTech

I think thats about it.

Oh and

Procedural Fairings

Enhanced Navball

I'm also getting a lot of SAS Wobble when taking off, and even in space.

Edited August 26, 2015 by Lockheart
Seems it had something to do with my Career mode, went into sandbox today and SAS worked fine there, so guess I'll be starting over, didn't get far anyways
